messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Hidden Halls Heist DATE: 08/08/58 The courtroom was aflutter with a mix of tension and anticipation as the trial unfolded. The prosecution summoned the officers pivotal to the investigation to share their accounts. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Anderson, the chief investigator of this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Anderson. Could you recount the events on the night the heist was discovered? WITNESS: Absolutely. On the night of February 2nd, Officer C. D. Baker witnessed a suspicious activity near the Hidden Halls and reported it. Our team commenced the investigation at once. PROSECUTOR: Who oversaw the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Clark and Technician G. H. Davis led the forensic examination. PROSECUTOR: Who undertook the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Edwards and K. L. Foster conducted the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense initiated a cross-examination of Captain Anderson regarding the investigative methods used. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Green, O. P. Hill, and Q. R. Jackson were also called to the stand.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
